message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than $80 to you, potentially up to $100 based on your needs. Considering this, I'd like to propose an offer of $95 for the product. This price reflects its true value while allowing us to maintain a fair margin. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response.
